description:
maximum non-repetitive peak reverse current of a stabiliser diode at specified virtual front time and virtual time to half-value.
8/20 impulse:| 8 us virtual front time/ 20 us virtual time to half-value| 4/10 impulse:, 4 us virtual front time/ 10 us virtual time to half-value| 6/320 impulse:| 6 us virtual front time/ 320 us virtual time to half-value| 10/1000 impulse:| 10 us virtual front time/ 1000 us virtual time to half-value.
